SNVI (Société Nationale des Véhicules Industriels, National Company of Industrial Vehicles na Bekee, ma ọ bụ المؤسسة الوطنية Platربات الصناعية na Arabic), nke bụbu National Society of Mechanical Construction (SONACOME) bụ ụlọ ọrụ Algeria rụpụtara gwongworo na bọs kemgbe 1967.
Gọọmentị Algeria guzobere Sonacome na August 9, 1967, site na iwu 67-150
Ọ ketara ụlọ ọrụ na ngwá ọrụ Berliet nke oge French mgbe nke ikpeazụ kwụsịrị ọrụ na 1973.
Na May 1995, SNVI gbanwere ọnọdụ iwu ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ akụ na ụba ọha na eze nke iwu nkịtị na-achịkwa, SNVI emeziri dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nkwonkwo (SPA), nke nwere isi obodo nke 2.2 ijeri Dinars.
Isi ụlọ ọrụ SNVI dị na Rouiba, kilomita 30 n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Algiers, nwere alaka na Hussein Dey, Constantine, Oran na Ouargla.
Na 2011, ụlọ ọrụ mere 2007 ụgbọ ala
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịmaliteghachi ya na ọnụego mmepụta ya nke 1980, nke na-eru ụgbọ ala 6000 kwa afọ.
SNVI na-ebupụ ngwaahịa ya na ọtụtụ mba dịka:
SNVI na-emepụta gwongworo, bọs, na ọkara ụgbọala.
SNVI na-enye ọtụtụ gwongworo maka ebumnuche ndị nkịtị na ndị agha.
